DOC.brief_summary: The purpose Phase II Small Business Technology Transfer ( STTR ) project complete development evaluate usability effectiveness Wraparound Team Monitoring System ( Wrap-TMS ) , web-based , electronic behavioral health information system ( EBHIS ) widely implement care coordination model child 's behavioral health , wraparound process . Though wraparound consider `` evidence-based , '' implementation real world often fail conform standard fidelity and/or use objective data guide management , supervision , clinical decision making . Availability system support efficiency , implementation quality fidelity , outcomes youth enrol wraparound . Wrap-TMS feature functionality data entry , management , basic report full array data information element need manage integrate care coordination initiative youth serious emotional behavioral disorder ( SEBD ) . In light success Phase I , subsequent partnership federal agency , inquiry interest several state 20 provider manage care organization , Phase II STTR investigator complete development Wrap-TMS , follow randomize control effectiveness study compare n=25 wraparound facilitator use Wrap-TMS serving n=100 family 25 non-user facilitator serve 100 family practitioner , implementation , youth/family outcomes . The evaluation test two primary hypothesis : 1 . Compared facilitator control group , wraparound facilitator train use Wrap-TMS demonstrate ( ) great use data feedback service delivery ; ( b ) great fidelity wraparound process ; ( c ) high self-reported teamwork , work alliance , satisfaction intervention ; ( ) positive attitude toward standardized assessment . 2 . Compared control group , parent youths receive service facilitator train use TMS report ( ) great goal clarity , ( b ) data collection use ( c ) great satisfaction service progress , ( ) good fidelity wraparound , ( e ) effective team functioning , ( f ) great treatment alliance , ( f ) good youth outcome include great progress improve symptom function .
DOC.brief_title: Development Testing Electronic Behavioral Health Record Specific Wraparound Care Coordination Process
DOC.criteria: Parent legal guardian youth age 617 SEBD ( serious emotional behavioral disorder ) : least one MH ( mental health ) diagnosis result longterm ( > 6 mo ) impairment home , school and/or community function ) . Non English speak parent Foster parent
